title: Reliance launches JioPC: High-end cloud computing on your TV for just Rs 400/month - Daijiworld.com
text:
Daijiworld Media Network- Bengaluru
Bengaluru, Jul 31: In a significant stride towards affordable digital transformation, Reliance Jio has unveiled JioPC, a cloud-based virtual desktop platform designed to turn any ordinary television screen into a high-performance computer — all at a pocket-friendly price of Rs 400 per month.
For the first time, users across India can access premium computing capabilities without investing in expensive hardware. JioPC offers the power and performance of a desktop worth over Rs 50,000, directly from the cloud, using just a Jio Set-Top Box, a keyboard, mouse, and a display screen.
With no lock-in period, JioPC is accessible to both existing and new JioFiber as well as JioAirFiber users. The system boots up quickly, remains updated at all times, and offers network-level protection from malware, viruses, and online threats.
What’s more, new subscribers can enjoy a one-month free trial, making it an ideal option for students, remote workers, and families seeking an affordable digital solution.
JioPC Key Features:
• Affordable Plan: Starts at Rs 400/month with no binding contract
• Zero Hardware Hassles: Converts any screen into a smart cloud PC
• Fast and Secure: AI-powered tools with virus and malware protection
• Cloud Storage: Comes with 512 GB of cloud storage
• Productivity Suite: Includes Jio Workplace, browser-based Microsoft Office, and access to Adobe Express
• Pan-India Availability: Open to JioFiber and JioAirFiber customers nationwide
How to Set Up JioPC:
1. Switch on the Jio Set-Top Box and go to the Apps section
2. Open the JioPC app and click ‘Get Started’
3. Connect a keyboard and mouse
4. Sign in using your registered mobile number or register as a new user
5. Begin using your cloud-powered virtual computer instantly
With JioPC, Reliance Jio is not just offering a product — it's delivering a game-changing digital experience that brings professional computing within the reach of every household.
